snippet.title: BL Pro Surfing 2022 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Pick it up now from Steam Early Access here: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1776170/Barton_Lynch_Pro_Surfing_2022/

Barton Lynch Pro Surfing 2022 for Xbox One and Steam is a surfing sports game that pits you against the world’s best surfer’s at the most exotic locations on the planet. The expansive world tour features an in-depth leader-board and sports commentary, or if you prefer to free surf, you can just cruise the massive locations instead. Pump control uses the wave’s power so you can surf faster and unlock more moves. More speed = more moves! Pump, smash that lip, get sooo barreled and launch airs from waves that barrel, peak, break left, right, or just foam crumble. Control the weather! Use your sick weather tool to directly impact how you play. So create any surf conditions you want using the amazing weather tool that impacts conditions in real-time. A legit soundtrack including Smoking Martha, Kilns, Oly Sherman, Wing Defence, Mesmeriser and Bad Pony - distinctive music that blends well with BL Pro Surfing’s worldwide vibe and fluid physics-based control mechanics. Tour Modes, Free Surf, Trick Challenges – endless hours of challenges and replay-ability. Customize your own character to within an inch of your life, or, play as some of today’s top pros including: Yago Dora, Clay Marzo, Nathan Florence, Soli Bailey, Mahina Maeda, Vahine Fierro, Felicity Palmateer, and of course the legendary world champion, coach and Pro Surfing commentator Barton Lynch.

Welcome to Barton Lynch Pro Surfing 2022 | A surfing sports game
